alert.note: Alert for Adams; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 9:09PM CST until December 15 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pike County in west central Illinois... Southern Adams County in west central Illinois... Northwestern Cole County in central Missouri... Ralls County in northeastern Missouri... Southeastern Boone County in central Missouri... Audrain County in central Missouri... Northwestern Montgomery County in east central Missouri... Southern Marion County in northeastern Missouri... Northern Callaway County in central Missouri... Eastern Monroe County in northeastern Missouri... Northwestern Pike County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 1000 PM CST. * At 908 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Warren to near Ashland, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Palmyra around 920 PM CST. Hannibal around 925 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Fulton, Fall Creek, Payson, Williamsburg and Shamrock. This includes the following highways... Interstate 172 between exits 2 and 10. Interstate 72 between exits 4 and 10. Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 131 and 161. This also includes Mark Twain Lake Recreational Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
